dcterms:creator: S. Beer
R. De Mooij
L. Liu
dcterms:description: This dataset is referenced in the context of international corporate tax avoidance, focusing on the channels, magnitudes, and blind spots related to profit shifting behavior and transfer pricing.

dcterms:creator: A. Cobham
P. Jansky
dcterms:description: This dataset is referenced in the context of estimating illicit financial flows, providing critical insights into the data, methodologies, and findings related to profit shifting behavior.

dcterms:creator: D. Dharmapala
dcterms:description: This dataset is referenced in the context of base erosion and profit shifting, reviewing empirical literature on the subject.

dcterms:creator: OECD
dcterms:description: This dataset provides guidelines for multinational enterprises and tax administrations regarding transfer pricing, relevant to the analysis of profit shifting behavior.

dcterms:creator: D. Schindler
G. Schjelderup
dcterms:description: This dataset is referenced in the context of income shifting by debt, analyzing the behavior of multinationals in relation to profit shifting.
